title: Red States Are the New Red Scare | Guest: Rep. Kat Cammack | 11/10/21
description:
Things are looking bad all across the country, but Glenn believes everything happens for the inevitable good. He gives examples of that, including the alternative college University at Austin story, which has a massive list of potential teachers lined up. Pat Gray joins to discuss the Rep. Paul Gosar anime controversy. Glenn explains how the government is shutting down three major energy elements: oil, coal, and gas. The red scare is now about the red states. Glenn discusses RedBalloon, a conservative service that connects people with job opportunities. Rep. Kat Cammack calls in to expose the most egregious parts of President Biden’s "Build Back Better" plan. Glenn and Stu discuss the latest shocking update in the Kyle Rittenhouse trial.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
